xwikidoc.name: WikiMacros
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity filter="none"}} {{html clean="false" wiki="true"}} = Existing wiki macro definitions = #set($mxwiki=$xwiki.getXWiki()) #set($mcontext=$context.getContext()) #set($sql="select doc.fullName from XWikiDocument doc, BaseObject obj where doc.fullName=obj.name and obj.className='XWiki.WikiMacroClass'") #set($mdocs=$mxwiki.getStore().search($sql, 0, 0, $mcontext)) #info("[$listtool.size($mdocs)] wiki macro definition(s) found:")
#foreach($mdoc in $mdocs) [[$mdoc>>$mdoc]]
#end {{/html}} {{/velocity}}
